name: CEEK Smart VR
description: CEEK offers an existing Virtual Reality platform with partners such as Universal Music, Apple and T-Mobile. CEEK creates, curates and distributes VR content using patented VR headsets and CEEK’s VR platform. СЕЕК users can access live performances and other exciting experiences via smart devices including Smart TV’s, Mobile phones, AR and VR headsets while physically being anywhere in the world where there is an Internet connection. CEEK also presents opportunities for performers and anyone with premium content to sell unlimited virtual tickets together with physical and digital merchandising.
